commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Guys, where do you want to go today?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Considering we have the day off I'd like to take a nap in a quiet, warm place.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Zzz...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hey, Kana! Wake up!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Oh boy. She's half asleep already.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Well, we're not taking a nap. Rinari, where do you want to go? It's been a while since we've had a day off without practice.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Me? I don't mind wherever.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We're using today for me to get to know you guys better, so I want to go where you want to go and do what you want to do.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I'm okay with anything fun! As long as we're all together!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: *Snore*

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Kanata probably will only ever give you that one answer. So Rina, will you tell me something you want to do?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Okay. I want to go to Harajuku. Rina-chan Board says, "Woo-hoo!"

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Harajuku. What do you want to do there?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I want to eat crepes. And a snow cone. And a parfait with rabbit ears. And cream puffs.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Rina, you know all the good food there. They have a popcorn shop from Seattle, too.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I love popcorn. I want to walk around eating it with my friends. I want to do something a normal high school girl would, just once in a while.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Great idea! Let's get going then. We can search for the stores on our phones.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I know Harajuku pretty well, so I can show you guys around. Can we go to a thrift store on our way?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: S-So many people. Rina-chan Board says, "Dizzyyy..."

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Seriously. It's hard enough just getting out of the station.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: It's always like this. The ticket gates are just small, see? Now, where to first?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Crepes!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: You've woken up at an opportune time.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Hehehe, I had a nice nap on the train, so I have lots of energy.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Okay, let's get going!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: *Munch* *Munch*

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: How is it, Rina?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: *Munch* *Munch*

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Rina?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Oh, Sorry! It's so good I was focused entirely on eating. Rina-chan Board says, "Enchanted."

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hahaha! I know what you mean! It's delicious!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Want to try mine? It's sweet bean and strawberry cream.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Thanks Ai. *Munch* *Munch*

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Rina-chan Board says, "Moved..."

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Try mine, too! Mine's peaches and cream!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Thanks Kanata. *Munch* This is amazing...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Here Rina, have some of mine, too. It's chocolate banana.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Thanks. *Munch* *Munch* I'm in heaven.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Guys, have some of mine, too. Blueberries and cream with ice cream on top!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Mm! It's so good!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: This is like a dream come true. In Harajuku with my friends, eating crepes... I've wanted to do this forever.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Oh my gosh, Rina. That's so cute! Why don't we walk around while we eat?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: There's a thrift store I want to check out over there.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Woo! Let's go!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You ended up buying a lot, huh.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I've been here with Karin before. It's cheap and has a lot of cute clothes, so I like it.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I like it, too!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Look at this, I got matching t-shirts, 300 yen for one! What a deal!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What did you buy, Rina?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: A skirt. I think if I make a couple small changes I can use it as a stage costume.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You're so crafty, Rina. I can't wait to see what you're going to turn it into.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Can we go to the rabbit cream puff store next?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I wanted to check that place out too! I should buy some souvenirs for Haruka.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I should get some for my grandma and sister too!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: They have bunny ear parfaits!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Really?! Let's have that!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: We'll get fat if we don't do a whole lot of walking today.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Oh, it's fine. Everything will balance out as long as we work hard at practice tomorrow.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: You think so too, right?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'll think of a special, hardcore routine then.

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Whaaaat?!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Woo, what a day!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I got a lot of souvenirs for Haruka so I'm satisfied. How was Harajuku for you, Rina?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: It was so fun! Let's go again sometime.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, we'll all go together someday.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (It was so fun going out with just us four. I want to take this feeling to the piano. I want to play while remembering how fun it all was.)
